document.full_text: japan's economy offered more signs of recovery from the deadly march earthquake on tuesday, but moody's ratings agency warned both growth and government action may fall short of what is necessary to bring tokyo's ballooning debt back under control.
document.title: japan recovery takes hold, but debt downgrade looms
